methods.name: moveUp
methods.descr: Move the sprite one layer up

methods.name: moveDown
methods.descr: Move the sprite one layer down

methods.name: sendToBack
methods.descr: Send the sprite to the lowest layer

methods.name: bringToTop
methods.descr: Bring the sprite to the highest layer

Hero.name: Hero
Hero.descr: Main character of a platform game. It is controllable with the keyboard arrows.

properties.name: canFall
properties.descr: Allows hero to fall below the bottom border of the game

events.name: isHit
events.descr: Indicates whether the hero is hit by a bullet

events.name: fell
events.descr: Indicates whether the hero has fallen below the bottom border of the game

events.name: touchEnemy
events.descr: Indicates whether the hero is touching an Enemy

methods.name: restart
methods.descr: Reset the hero properties to its initial values: position, width, height, angle, costume, jumpForce, gravity and speed

methods.name: equipWeapon
methods.descr: Equip an existing weapon. Note: use fire() to use the equipped weapon

methods.name: fire
methods.descr: Use the weapon equipped by the hero if any

methods.name: equipWeapon
methods.descr: Unequip the equipped weapon if any

Platform.name: Platform
Platform.descr: Platform on which hero and enemies can stand

properties.name: bottomBlocking
properties.descr: If false, a hero can jump on the platform from below

Decor.name: Decor
Decor.descr: An image that won't interact with other sprites. It is automatically set in the background.

Enemy.name: Enemy
Enemy.descr: Platform ennemy that automatically walks on platforms

properties.name: autoMove
properties.descr: Enable automatic motion of the enemy

events.name: isHit
events.descr: Indicates whether the enemy is hit by a bullet

Spaceship.name: Spaceship
Spaceship.descr: Main character of a space game. It is controllable with the keyboard arrows

events.name: isHit
events.descr: Indicates whether the spaceship is hit by a bullet

Weapon.name: Weapon
Weapon.descr: Represents the bullet this weapon can shoot. A weapon cannot be directly add to the game but can be equipped by some types of sprite.

properties.name: fireAngle
properties.descr: Direction toward which the bullets are fired. It will be updated automatically if equipped by a Hero.

properties.name: fireRate
properties.descr: Time in ms between two shots when the weapon fires continuously.

properties.name: italic
properties.descr: Whether the text is in italic

properties.name: bold
properties.descr: Whether the text is in bold

Object.name: Object
Object.descr: An object can interact with all type of sprite.
